ai-kv2.7:5.4_0: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that’s as quick to change as the mind.

ai-kv2.7:6.1_0: Thoughts that are kept rolling by the mind
ai-kv2.7:6.4_0: “Mendicants, suppose a monkey moving through the forest. It grabs hold of one branch, lets it go, and grabs another; then it lets that go and grabs yet another.
ai-kv2.7:6.5_0: In the same way, that which is called ‘mind’ or ‘sentience’ or ‘consciousness’ arises as one thing and ceases as another all day and all night.”
ai-kv2.7:6.9_0: “These things are kept rolling by the mind.”
